content: We are experiencing FHIR validation errors on the Endpoint resource because the code system URL for EndpointPayloadType and EndpointConnectionType are not reachable ( http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/ValueSet/EndpointPayloadTypeVS http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/CodeSystem/EndpointConnectionTypeCS). Is this an artifact of the Da Vinci Plan-NET IG not being complete ?

@James Derrickson 2:37 PM

Hmm... that VS and CS are certainly part of the CI build version, but certainly not part of the STU1 ballot version.
Can you point the validator to the CI build version? https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/davinci-pdex-plan-net/ or alternatively, download the IG resources from there and point to the local copy?

@Saul Kravitz There appears to be a typo in the implementation guide for the code system, should be "CodeSystem-EndpointPayloadTypeCS" instead of "CodeSystem/EndpointConnectionTypeCS" "-" vs "|" before endpoint. This applies to the Valueset URL: http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pdex-plan-net/ValueSet/EndpointPayloadTypeVS. Also the build URL does not pass the validator. Since we are building product code we cannot reference a local copy. We will ignore the validator error for now.

Iâ€™ll take a look. Thx

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
If you are not pointing at the build URL you will be working with the balloted IG, which has long been overtaken by events.
I tried to check the STU1 ballot download version (0.1), and the download looks quite corrupted.

Saul Kravitz said:

I tried to check the STU1 ballot download version (0.1), and the download looks quite corrupted.

Hi Saul,

Do you have an estimate on the publish date for STU1? When we talked before connectathon, I believe it was estimate mid-October. Are you on track?

Hi @Kristin Ashby - we presented the IG to the FM WG on Tuesday and they are supposed to vote on it next Tuesday. Assuming no surprised, it will then be headed for publication. I'm not planning on making any more changes (other than cosmetic ones).
